name: a Student from TRR
title: Student
content:
I truly appreciate the work done by the FEEDX team. The content shared is very
useful and helps students stay informed about important updates. Through FEEDX,
we receive timely information related to exams, results, job alerts, internships, and
government schemes, which is very helpful for diploma students.
The posts, responses, and interactions are clear and student-friendly. FEEDX
makes students feel heard and supported. Many of my friends also follow FEEDX
for reliable information and guidance. I hope FEEDX continues to support students
and provide more insights on exams, interviews, resumes, and skill development.
